meta.content: Technology; Corrections; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

abstract.p: Correction of article in E-Commerce Report column of May 22 Business Day ysection about rigors faced by Internet companies trying to expand globally

block.p: Because of an editing error, the E-Commerce Report column of Business Day yesterday, about the rigors faced by Internet companies trying to expand globally, misstated the ownership of Boo.com, the British online retailer. The company, which announced last week that it was going out of business, is owned by its founders and private investors. It has not made a public stock offering.
